About Tiny Eden

At Tiny Eden, we believe in nurturing more than just plants — we nurture moments, memories, and mindfulness. Our passion is helping people reconnect with nature through hands-on terrarium building experiences.

Founded with the dream of bringing nature indoors, Tiny Eden started as a small idea and bloomed into a community space where creativity and green living thrive. From curated DIY kits to immersive in-person workshops, every Tiny Eden terrarium is a living work of art made with love and intention.

Whether you're new to plants or a seasoned green thumb, our goal is to offer you a calming, inspiring experience that helps you grow something beautiful — both in your space and within yourself.
